title: Ban..
body: Can i somehow get unban , please?

replies.body: Hello, this is the Italian forum. If you think you have been banned wrongly, please send a ticket to Riot [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

> [{quoted}](name=Dodop,realm=EUW,application-id=98NGV4Al,discussion-id=xVglFEMW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-06-04T21:12:13.575+0000)
>
> Hello, this is the Italian forum. If you think you have been banned wrongly, please send a ticket to Riot [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Please do so. Since this is the italian board and everyone is required to use italian language, I'm going to close this thread.
